title: Container sits on a table in a dark room

content.prompt: A sealed container of air has been sitting on a table in a dark room for a very long time. The room is always kept at a constant temperature. Which of the following best describes what will happen to the speeds and the average kinetic energy of the molecules of the air in the container as the container continues to sit on the table?

choices.label: Each molecule will continue to move at constant speed, keeping the average kinetic energy of the molecules constant.
Some molecules will speed up and others will slow down, keeping the average kinetic energy of the molecules constant.
The molecules will gradually slow down, decreasing their average kinetic energy.
The molecules will gradually speed up, increasing their average kinetic energy.

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
